nodes.text: Jenarian was a male Commander of the Order of Revan living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY he was defending a Revanite position at the Imperial Guard Academy on Yavin 4, where he was killed by combined forces of the Yavin Coalition.
Commander Jenarian appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. Killing him is required to obtain an achievement.
